Tonsillectomy.context: Tonsillectomy. Tonsillitis. McIvor mouth gag was placed in the oral cavity and a tongue depressor applied.

Tonsillitis.context: Tonsillectomy. Tonsillitis. McIvor mouth gag was placed in the oral cavity and a tongue depressor applied.

McIvor mouth gag.context: McIvor mouth gag was placed in the oral cavity and a tongue depressor applied.

tongue depressor.context: McIvor mouth gag was placed in the oral cavity and a tongue depressor applied.

1.5 cc of 1% Xylocaine with 1:100,000 ep.context: The anterior tonsillar pillar was infiltrated with 1.5 cc of 1% Xylocaine with 1:100,000 epinephrine, as was the left tonsillar pillar.

tenaculum.context: The right tonsil was grasped with the tenaculum and retracted out of its fossa.

plica semilunaris.context: The plica semilunaris was incised with the Metzenbaum scissors.

Metzenbaum scissors.context: Using the Metzenbaum scissors and the Fisher knife, the tonsil was dissected free of its fossa onto an inferior pedicle around which the tonsillar snare was placed and applied.

Fisher knife.context: Using the Metzenbaum scissors and the Fisher knife, the tonsil was dissected free of its fossa onto an inferior pedicle around which the tonsillar snare was placed and applied.

tonsillar snare.context: Using the Metzenbaum scissors and the Fisher knife, the tonsil was dissected free of its fossa onto an inferior pedicle around which the tonsillar snare was placed and applied.

cherry gauze sponge.context: The fossa packed with a cherry gauze sponge as previously described.

suction Bovie unit.context: Bleeding was controlled with the suction Bovie unit.

debris.context: The nasal passages and oropharynx were suctioned free of debris.

tolerated the procedure well.context: The patient tolerated the procedure well and left the operating room in good condition.
